org.lightningj.paywall.qrcode

Interface QRCodeGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultQRCodeGenerator

    public interface QRCodeGenerator
    Interface for generating QR Code of text data used in payment flows. Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-12-18.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] generatePNG(java.lang.String data, int width, int height)
      Method to generate a PNG image QR code of the given text with the dimensions specified.

    • Method Detail

      • generatePNG

        byte[] generatePNG(java.lang.String data,
                   int width,
                   int height)
            throws InternalErrorException
        Method to generate a PNG image QR code of the given text with the dimensions specified.
        Parameters:
        data - the text data to encode into a QR Code
        width - the width of the image.
        height - the height of the image.
        Returns:
        the image data in PNG format. null if text data was null.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if internal problem occurred generating the image.
